entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 8:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: SSW 33 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early this evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
